name: Imanol Herrero
title: FullStack Web Developer & IT Technician
about_me_description: I am a developer with experience in both Front End and Back End. I specialize mainly in problem-solving, contributing ideas, and providing solutions. I am both a logical and creative person who can add value individually as well as in a team. I enjoy technical challenges that allow me to grow and learn something new every day.
description_exp_1: I led the complete development of the Frontend client: a forum-style website where users can make medical inquiries, and healthcare professionals can respond, integrating key functionalities and connecting various APIs provided by the backend.
description_exp_2: I was part of a development team for a job marketplace website where I applied my knowledge in ReactJS and NodeJS, implementing CRUD operations in the project's backend and developing frontend views using TailwindCSS while following the designs proposed in Figma.
description_exp_3: I automated invoice-related processes for ARCA (formerly AFIP - Federal Administration of Public Revenues) and their subsequent analysis in Microsoft Excel for a prominent company in the agroquimichal sector. This system includes multiple error controls that ensure security and optimize time, generating a positive impact on the company's productivity.
description_exp_4: I developed the complete frontend of a mobile application: a symptom journal where users can add or edit health symptoms and view them on a calendar, respecting the design provided by the client and integrating various functionalities through backend APIs. Additionally, I conducted weekly demos to ensure alignment with project goals.
project4_description: Fetch news from various various sources.
